snippet: Assistance for vacation properties is all but unheard-of in higher education, but New York University has given it to a number of executives and faculty members.
abstract: New York University has made loans to executives and star professors for expensive vacation homes, in what educational experts call a bold new frontier for lavish university compensation; already attracts attention for multimillion-dollar loans it extends to some faculty for buying homes in New York City, practice it has defended as necessary to attract talent to one of most expensive cities on earth, but experts say aid for vacation homes is all but unheard of.

byline.original: By ARIEL KAMINER and ALAIN DELAQUÉRIÈRE

lead_paragraph: Assistance for vacation properties is all but unheard-of in higher education, but New York University has given it to a number of executives and faculty members.

headline.main: N.Y.U. Gives Its Stars Loans for Summer Homes
headline.print_headline: N.Y.U. Gives Its Stars Loans for Summer Homes
